name: Web Portfolio
description: This portfolio website! View my project pages, resume, and code repositories from one central location.

name: MVP Timer
description: A timer built to track rare enemies in the game Ragnarok Online. Includes searching and marking last spawn.

name: ARK Discord Bot
description: Discord bot that starts, stops, and updates server instances for ARK: Survival Evolved.

name: DCC Trusted
description: Plugin for the Hexchat IRC Client. Maintains a trusted list of clients to allow file transfers from.

name: Webpack React Template
description: Web development template with react, webpack, and sass. Supports HMR, dev/prod mode, and minifying code.

name: RO Item Manager
description: Console-based item manager for Ragnarok Online. Easily add flags for quest, cooking, and upgrade ingredients to item description files.

name: Hypothetical OS
description: Console-based CPU and RAM emulator. Schedule jobs using various priority and memory allocation algorithms.

name: Minesweeper
description: Full-featured classic Minesweeper with three difficulties!

name: Connect Four
description: Classic connect four implemented using Java Swing. Get four in a row vertically, horizontally, or diagonally!

name: Multicast Chat
description: Practicing packet creation and management with Java! Send and receive messages via multicast.
